article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Montana
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Montana.
article.content:
​​

The US Commercial Service of the US Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized companies develop international markets. Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Choose viable market entry strategies
  • Identify & evaluate potential international partners
  • Examine delivery options & prepare price quotes
  • Draft international sales & distributorship contracts
  • Identify commodity-specific import protocols by country
  • Prepare commercial & transport documentation
  • Comply with federal export reporting requirements
  • Comply with federal export licensing law
  • Structure your export transactions to mitigate risk
  • Procure export financing
  • Tackle other export related issues as required

The Montana Export Assistance Center is part of an international network of global professionals. We have 165 offices in 82 countries throughout the world. For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please visit Our Services page. To learn first-hand how we can help your company grow internationally, click on Preliminary Consultation Survey.


I Want To:

  • Learn Export Basics
  • Begin Exporting
  • Expand My Exports
